item.title: Using Powershell to Create Windows SMB Shares
item.description: I have been knee deep in migrations, so after clicking through a few times to create clustered file shares, I finally decided to script them. Here is that script I thought I would share. Thanksfully there was the NTFSSecurity module published by microsoft that makes permissions a breeze. You can get more details by viewing the module page. item.title: Using Vagrant to Deploy a 2012R2 DHCP Failover Cluster

item.title: Unable to Install .NET 3.5 on Server 2012R2
item.description: So upon trying to install .Net 3.5 on a new server today it would not allow me to, it kept telling me the source files were unavailable even after pointing to source directly to multiple ISO’s and copied the files locally. Upon further research I stumbled across this microsoft KB article and used it to ultimately find my fix. KB2734782 Here are the full steps I followed to get .NET installed.
